name: Xcode Workspace
summary: An XCWORKSPACE file contains settings configuring the visual workspace in Apple Xcode, an IDE for macOS. It is a macOS package , similar to the .XCODEPROJ file, that stores data files containing workspace settings, such as the View (Navigator, Debug, and Utilities panes) and Editor states. Xcode users typically create XCWORKSPACE files to preserve the layout of a workspace they can load later.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: XCWORKSPACE file open in Apple Xcode 14
